name: CarmenJohnstonGardens
0:
”Alexa, launch Carmen Johnston Gardens”

”Alexa, ask Carmen Johnston Gardens”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: carmen johnston gardens
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Carmen Johnston has pioneered an approachable method of gardening and entertaining with flowers and plants by empowering beginners to veterans to create instant beauty through her smart container gardening. A key component of her philosophy is that all design, from gardens to landscape creations, should have a level of functionality. This mindset allows her to begin every project with great dedication and attention to detail.

This Skill allows you to connect with Carmen, learn her top tips to maximize your garden in a practical way. Includes Carmen's favorite cocktail recipes, home decor tips, ways to prepare your home for Fall, and more.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
